title: Welcome to PFSLive
subtitle: LIVE TRACKING & RESULTS
tagline: SHARE YOUR RACE OR TRAINING WITH YOUR FRIENDS & FAMILY

participant.title: Live Tracking
participant.description: Track and share your race progress in real-time

Event.title: Event Name
Event.description: You can start your live tracking from 1 hour before your start. Be sure to keep this app open all the time and do not close it!

tracking.waitingForRace: GPS activated. Data will be sent when race starts at {{time}}
tracking.waitingForRaceNoTime: GPS activated. Data will be sent when race starts.
tracking.manualStartEnabled: GPS activated. Sending data immediately (manual start enabled).

status.manualStartReady: Manual start enabled - ready to send
status.manualStartDescription: Data will be sent immediately when tracking starts

errors.missingInfoDescription: Participant or Event ID not found. Please refresh and try again.
errors.permissionDescription: Location permission is required to track your position.
errors.gpsErrorDescription: Failed to get GPS location. Please check if location services are enabled.

alerts.overrideMessage: Start sending location data now? This will override the scheduled race start time.
